name: Game Changers
description:
This game is all about change.  Throughout the game, phrases will appear at the top of the screen (such as "Big Bullets" and "Rainbow").  These will dictate how the game is modified throughout play.  If you have, for example, the "Double Speed" changer, the game will go two times faster (I feel like most of them are as self-explanatory as that).  More changers will be added over the play time, to a max of three.

You can play with either WASD and the mouse (and left-click), or with both analog sticks and the right bumper of a controller.  If you have a controller plugged in or connected, you will be unable to play with a keyboard, so keep that in mind.  You will always have to click when they game says something like "click to start."

I streamed the second day of making this on my Twitch channel (https://www.twitch.tv/theyellowgreninja) and on Mixer (https://mixer.com/37028545), and I used Game Maker Studio 2.
